short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily plan your trip while surfing the web by bookmarking things to do, hotels and anything else you might need for your trip

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily plan a trip by bookmarking your research into one handy place. 

This extension is a companion to your trip plan on Travellerspoint. If you are frequently browsing the internet and want to collate your research into one handy place, then this extension can help you do that. 

Found a great new attraction in Paris that you don't want to forget about? Click the extension icon, select the trip you want to add it to and save the bookmark. 

When you go back to your trip plan on Travellerspoint you will find all your bookmarks organised for you. 

Optionally select which stop on the trip the bookmark is relevant to or add freeform notes.
